caxton.gui.libraryLoadingFailed.descript: Caxton failed to load the native library. Please report an issue to the devs with the game’s output log.
caxton.gui.unsupportedPlatform.descripti: This copy of Caxton does not support your computer’s operating system and architecture. You will need to either find or build a copy of the mod for your computer or request for your platform to be supported.
This copy of Caxton does not support your computer’s operating system and architecture. You will need to find or build a copy of the mod for your computer.
Unfortunately, we can’t build pre-built copies of the mod for macOS.
